However, in the absence', 'of 12 months of amenorrhea, confirmation with two FSH measurements in the', 'postmenopausal range is required.', 'Females on HRT and whose menopausal status is in doubt will be required to use', 'one of the non-hormonal highly effective contraception methods if they wish to', 'continue their HRT during the study.
